amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service by $23 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase (by offset) the funding for Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service by $23 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Weiner amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 184 (Roll no. 182).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Weiner.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
